text:
<@U2H3TT8F2> this rollup says the updates are required by May 30, but we thought that the validation wouldn't take effect until May 30 - we prepared an update to release today/monday and can't validate because of the brand settings requirement.

This requirement and a couple of the others are more extensive for legacy themes like ours, can you help us to better understand the timeframe.

Are we expected to have the theme updated in the marketplace by Tuesday meeting all of the new requirements? what happens if we can't meet the deadline?

<@UHDEVB0S1>
